originalText.text: Words can not express how much I trust and appreciate Dr. Neil Lim. He has become my entire family's doctor and each of us love and trust him.  He takes the time to explain with warmth and care. Wonderful personality and bed side manner. I personally think he is a genius. I have recommend him to everyone, family, friends, & strangers. He is a rare gem.

text.text: Words can not express how much I trust and appreciate Dr. Neil Lim. He has become my entire family's doctor and each of us love and trust him.  He takes the time to explain with warmth and care. Wonderful personality and bed side manner. I personally think he is a genius. I have recommend him to everyone, family, friends, & strangers. He is a rare gem.

originalText.text: Dr. Lim is a fantastic physician, alert, caring, good listener, compassionate, and most importantly very thorough with his dealings with patients. I’m very pleased to have him as my primary doctor and at ease with a peace of mind I’m receiving excellent medical care and treatment.

text.text: Dr. Lim is a fantastic physician, alert, caring, good listener, compassionate, and most importantly very thorough with his dealings with patients. I’m very pleased to have him as my primary doctor and at ease with a peace of mind I’m receiving excellent medical care and treatment.

originalText.text: Dr. Lim is very thorough and caring. He was instrumental in identifying an issue with my husband's health and is guiding us through the treatments etc..  I recently became his patient based on how impressed we have been with the care he has given my husband.

originalText.text:
Dr. Neil Lim is phenomenal!
He is thorough, compassionate & professional.  He is literally one of the best Doctors I have ever been associated with over all of my years.  I leave my visits feeling very blessed that I have such a great Doctor.
I highly recommend Dr. Lim.

text.text:
Dr. Neil Lim is phenomenal!
He is thorough, compassionate & professional.  He is literally one of the best Doctors I have ever been associated with over all of my years.  I leave my visits feeling very blessed that I have such a great Doctor.
I highly recommend Dr. Lim.

originalText.text: Just had my second annual physical with Dr Lim, and would like to say how very happy and satisfied I am! Just recently went through my very first bout of COVID under his care. We had a virtual visit and he smoothed the way to recovery with thorough and informative management. My in-person physical was the same—excellent in every way, including the nursing staff and office surround. He is wonderfully intelligent and a pleasure to talk with—highly recommended!
